full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DBANG DRAG DREGS PA'I RGYAL PO DPAL LDAN LCAM SRING GI THUGS RTEN CHEN PO 'DZUG CHOG BKRA SHIS GANG 'KHYIL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (ZHES SNANG MTHA' DRAG PO DREGS PA'I RGYAL PO CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GIS DGYES MGUR SPYOD PA'I THUGS RTEN BKRA SHIS GANG 'KHYIL ZHES BYA BA, 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA, LKOG GYUR LUNG BSTAN CI RIGS THUB PA ZER BA DANG SKYA SER RGYAL BLON DU MAS MCHOD GNAS SU BYED PA'O, ,SLOB MA AER TE NI MER GIN NO MCHI PHUN TSOGS GRAGS PAS, 'DI LTA ZHIG BYED PA'I GA-YAR KHRAL DU MCHOG PAR, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD @013A *, ,MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I, CHOS SKYONG SO SO'I THUGS RTEN GYI CHO GA BSDUS PA'I DGONGS RGYAN GSAL BYED, 'DIS LUGS YIN PA 'DRA ZER BA'I DPE CHA DANG, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON GYIS MDZAD PA'I LCAM SRING GI THUGS CHOG DANG LAS LEGS PA'I CHA GANG YIN RNAMS BLANGS TE KHA BSKANG BYAS TE CHOS SKYONG 'DI NYID LA GTOR MA BSNGO TZAM BYED PA RNAMS LAS MI DMAN, BTZUN GZUGS DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS, SA BYA LO'I STON ZLA THA CHUNG GI TSES GNYIS PA LA SBYAR BA'O, ,RNAM DKAR DGE BA 'DIS KUN MKHYEN SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS KYI SKU KHAMS BZANG ZHING SKU TSE RING BA DANG RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I 'PHRIN LAS PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PA DANG, 'KHOR MTHA' MED PA'I DRIN CAN PHA MAR GYUR BA'I SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN THOGS PA'I RGYU RU GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
